verses.name: 2 Chronicles 30:10
verses.text: So the posts passed from city to city through the country of Ephraim and Manasseh even unto Zebulun: but they laughed them to scorn, and mocked them.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 30:11
verses.text: Nevertheless divers of Asher and Manasseh and of Zebulun humbled themselves, and came to Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 30:12
verses.text: Also in Judah the hand of God was to give them one heart to do the commandment of the king and of the princes, by the word of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 30:13
verses.text: And there assembled at Jerusalem much people to keep the feast of unleavened bread in the second month, a very great congregation.
